page.title: 10Living in a Hotel.
page.content: A hotel is the place where people stay when they go on holiday.I live in a hotel.When you live in a hotel,you can't get up until breakfast is finished.You are not allowed into the kitchen from 5.30 to 7.30 during dinner. We can't get out together very much,but every Sunday afternoon as soon as my mum and dad have finished all of their jobs,we go out for about 4 hours until 8.00.You do not have much space in a hotel for your belongings and you can't go up to where the visitors stay.Also we don't have a lounge or dining room of our own.You can't make much noise when there are visitors staying,but my mum says I make enough noise anyway.I used to live in normal house,but I wouldn't like to go back in spite of all these drawbacks. Amanda Bayley
